Below is a list of Open Source projects which I am actively contributing to or contributed in the past. You can also check out my GitHub and Ohloh pages for more detailed information.

My Projects

  • sydbox: Ptrace based sandbox

    I’m the main developer of sydbox. Since 2009-08-17 this is the default sandbox of Exherbo Linux distribution.

    • http://dev.exherbo.org/~alip/sydbox/
    • http://git.exherbo.org/?p=sydbox.git;a=summary
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/sydbox
    • tags/#sydbox
    • http://www.exherbo.org

  • pinktrace: Lightweight ptrace() library

    • http://dev.exherbo.org/~alip/pinktrace/
    • http://github.com/alip/pinktrace
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/pinktrace
    • http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ptrace
    • http://www.kernel.org/doc/man-pages/online/pages/man2/ptrace.2.html
    • tags/#pinktrace

  • envtag: Audio tagger for use in shell scripts

    • http://github.com/alip/envtag
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/envtag
    • tags/#envtag

  • mpdcron: Cron like utility for the Music Playing Daemon

    • http://thelinux.pro/mpdcron
    • http://github.com/alip/mpdcron
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/mpdcron
    • http://mpd.wikia.com/wiki/Client:MPDCRON
    • http://mpd.wikia.com/
    • tags/#mpdcron

  • afprint: Audio fingerprinting tool

    • http://github.com/alip/afprint
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/afprint
    • tags/#afprint
    • http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acoustic_fingerprint

Playground

Below are my projects which are in early development stage:

  • libchess: Chess library written in C99

    • http://github.com/alip/libchess

  • luampdclient: Lua bindings for libmpdclient

    • http://github.com/alip/luampdclient
    • http://mpd.wikia.com/wiki/ClientLib:libmpdclient
    • http://www.lua.org/

  • pandora: sydbox rewrite, aiming for less dependencies and easier maintainability

    • http://github.com/alip/pandora

  • Qoropa: Console interface for notmuch mail indexer, written in Haskell using Vty library

    • http://github.com/alip/qoropa
    • http://www.haskell.org/haskellwiki/Library/VTY
    • http://www.haskell.org/

Contributed Projects

  • Exherbo: Source based Linux distribution

    I’ve been an Exherbo developer since 2009. I’m maintaining many packages and contributing to related projects such as Paludis. My personal developer repository also known as ::alip is here

    • http://www.exherbo.org
    • http://git.exherbo.org/summer/repositories/alip/
    • http://git.exherbo.org/?p=dev/alip.git;a=summary
    • tags/#exherbo

  • notmuch: The mail indexer

    I maintain ruby bindings for notmuch mail indexer.
    I wrote notmuch-deliver which is now maintained by Thomas Schwinge.
    I’ve also done some work on Haskell bindings for notmuch.

    • http://git.notmuchmail.org/git/notmuch/tree/HEAD:/bindings/ruby
    • http://github.com/tschwinge/notmuch-deliver
    • http://github.com/alip/notmuch-deliver
    • http://github.com/alip/hs-notmuch
    • http://notmuchmail.org/pipermail/notmuch/2010/002869.html
    • http://notmuchmail.org/pipermail/notmuch/2010/002871.html
    • http://notmuchmail.org/
    • http://www.haskell.org/
    • http://ruby-lang.org/

Unmaintained Projects

Below are projects which I no longer maintain, drop an e-mail to if you are interested in maintaining them.

  • boogie: mpd client similar to mpc.

    • http://github.com/alip/boogie
    • http://mpd.wikia.com/
    • http://mpd.wikia.com/wiki/Client:Mpc
    • tags/#boogie

  • luachess: Chess module for Lua

    • http://github.com/alip/luachess
    • http://www.lua.org/

  • luatomcrypt: Lua bindings for libtomcrypt.

    • http://github.com/alip/luatomcrypt
    • http://libtom.org/
    • http://www.lua.org/

  • paludis-utils: Useful utilities for the Paludis package manager

    • http://github.com/alip/paludis-utils
    • http://www.ohloh.net/p/paludis-utils

Previous Projects

  • Gentoo: Source based Linux distribution

    I was a Gentoo developer between 2007 and 2009. I worked in Gentoo Python and Vim team and was responsible for many Python and Vim packages, their patches and security issues. In addition, I worked on porting Portage to py3k.

    Here is a brief history with links:

    • Became a Gentoo Sunrise committer on 2007-04-06
    • Joined on 20 Jun 2007
    • Retired on 9 Mar 2009
    • My developer bug is bug 181049
    • My commit activity on Ohloh for Gentoo Linux and Gentoo Sunrise
